website_summaries.verdict: The interface is simple to use and fun in this electronic dictionary designed for children still learning to read.
pros: Children will love using this dictionary that is fun and informative at the same time
As children encounter unfamiliar words, this dictionary will give them the proper spelling and meaning of the words
With a familiar QWERTY layout and screen that is easy to read, the device is simple to use as well
cons: Because the database in this dictionary is intended for children learning to read, some users may find the number of entries too small for their purposes

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a month!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product for the one month that it actually worked. We purchased this for my son to use on his state writing exam. It was very beneficial for the practice test. The night before the actual test, which was a month later, it wouldn't turn on. We replaced the batteries twice, and there was no power whatsoever. I'm disappointed with this purchase, and of course, it's too late to make any returns.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Edited review, after having the product for a little over a month. It froze and now does not work. When it did work, it was able to help my daughter complete her reading homework.
customer_reviews.author: Haydee

customer_reviews.title: Arrived late, never worked
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a week and a half after it was supposed to. Never worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for Xmas. Never worked, I put in a new battery & nope! The only reason why I did not returned it was because the kids were cleaning after the whole Xmas mess and apparently the threw away the packaging that it came with by accident.
customer_reviews.author: LISA H.

customer_reviews.title: Opened it & gave it to my daughter today. ...
customer_reviews.text: Opened it & gave it to my daughter today. She's been telling me definitions to differents words all night. I'm buying two more.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla Davis

customer_reviews.title: A travel size  dictionary
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old grandchild loves it . Its smaller then i thought when i was purchasing it. It also fit well in a backpack any bag actually its very small
customer_reviews.author: Monae

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it, But . . .
customer_reviews.text: I wish these were less expensive. I would buy enough for a whole class set.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Bikoi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my child who is learning how to read.
customer_reviews.author: dani m

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it appears
customer_reviews.text: Very small and did not seem very durable. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: rgc

customer_reviews.title: I would like for it to have a higher vocabulary
customer_reviews.text: I would like for it to have a higher vocabulary. I ordered it for fifth graders and quite a few of the words we needed were not in it.
customer_reviews.author: jose c Martinez
